name: tbi-extractor
label: tbiExtractor: Automated extraction of common data elements for traumatic brain injury.
description: Implementation of tbiExtractor for automated extraction of common data elements from radiology reports for traumatic brain injury.
author: Flywheel

radiology_report.description: The radiology report to be annotated by tbiExtractor.

corresponding_scan.description: The corresponding scan to receive the annotations as metadata.

save_target_phrases.description: Save the lexical target phrases identified in the report for the resulting annotation.

save_modifier_phrases.description: Save the lexical modifier phrases identified in the report for the resulting annotation.

diffuse_axonal.description: Include the lexical target: diffuse axonal.

epidural_hemorrhage.description: Include the lexical target: epidural hemorrhage.

facial_fracture.description: Include the lexical target: facial fracture.

fluid.description: Include the lexical target: extraaxial fluid collection.

gray_white_differentiation.description: Include the lexical target: gray-white matter differentiation.

hemorrhage.description: Include the lexical target: hemorrhage not-otherwise-specified.

herniation.description: Include the lexical target: brain herniation.

intracranial_pathology.description: Include the lexical target: intracranial pathology.

intraparenchymal_hemorrage.description: Include the lexical target: intraparenchymal hemorrage.

intraventricular_hemorrhage.description: Include the lexical target: intraventricular hemorrhage.

mass_effect.description: Include the lexical target: mass effect.

midline_shift.description: Include the lexical target: midline shift.

skull_fracture.description: Include the lexical target: skull fracture.

subarachnoid_hemorrhage.description: Include the lexical target: subarachnoid hemorrhage.

subdural_hemorrhage.description: Include the lexical target: subdural hemorrhage.

swelling.description: Include the lexical target: brain swelling.
